hadith.text: Thabit reported that Anas b. Malik was asked about the dyeing (of the hair of) Allah's Apostle (ï·º). Thereupon he said.:(They were so few) that if I so liked I could count their number in his head, and he further said: (That is) he did not dye. Abu Bakr, however, dyed them and so did 'Umar dye them with pure henna
